entry.title: 医学统计学的图表-Chart of medical statistics
entry.content:
一些常用的医学统计学图表

森林图

森林图(forest plot)怎么看？ - 钟多少玲的文章 - 知乎 https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/268431281

一文带你玩转森林图！

RR/OR/HR

RR：相对风险比

OR：比值比

HR：风险比

一篇非常好的文章：医学统计学中RR、OR和HR三个关于比值的概念

Nomogram

手把手教你用R画列线图(Nomogram)及解读结果 - 医小咖的文章 - 知乎 https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/85790353

小提琴图/Violin Plot

小提琴图 (Violin Plot) 用于显示数据分布及其概率密度。

这种图表结合了箱形图和密度图的特征，主要用来显示数据的分布形状。中间的黑色粗条表示四分位数范围，从其延伸的幼细黑线代表 95% 置信区间，而白点则为中位数。

箱形图在数据显示方面受到限制，简单的设计往往隐藏了有关数据分布的重要细节。例如使用箱形图时，我们不能了解数据分布是双模还是多模。虽然小提琴图可以显示更多详情，但它们也可能包含较多干扰信息。

entry.title: Hello, world. Hello, friends
entry.content:
Hello,

I am a PhD candidate at Zhejiang University, and my advisors are Prof.Changzheng Yuan and Prof. Jie Yang. My major is Public health and Preventive medicine, and my research interests mainly focus on healthcare data analysis. Actually, I am a newbie in this area, but fortunately, my advisors and teammates are very nice!

Previously, I received an M.S. degree in translational medicine at the School of Public Health, Xiamen University. During my master’s period, I mainly focused on cryo-EM image processing.

In the future, I hope to do some interesting, meaningful, and useful work in medicine and make a small contribution to human health!

I like badminton and billiards, and I also like Dota2, although I have not played it for a long time…

If you see here, you are probably interesting and free, and such people usually have more luck :) I also wish you happy and healthy every day!

Everything is going well.

Best regards!

Jiageng Wu

Email: wujg1995@163.com

Publications

2024

[1] Jiageng Wu, Xian Wu, Zhaopeng Qiu, Minghui Li, Shixu Lin, Yingying Zhang, Jie Yang, “Large language models leverage external knowledge to extend clinical insight beyond language boundaries” Journal of the American Medical Informatics Association (2024): ocae079.

2023

[1] Jiageng, Wu, Lumin Wang, Yining Hua, Minghui Li, Li Zhou, David W. Bates, and Jie Yang. “Trend and Co-occurrence Network of COVID-19 Symptoms From Large-Scale Social Media Data: Infoveillance Study.” Journal of Medical Internet Research 25 (2023): e45419.

[2] Jiageng Wu, Xian Wu, Yining Hua, Shixu Lin, Yefeng Zheng, and Jie Yang. 2023. Exploring Social Media for Early Detection of Depression in COVID-19 Patients. In Proceedings of the ACM Web Conference 2023 (WWW ’23), May 1–5, 2023, Austin, TX, USA. ACM, New York, NY, USA, 10 pages.

2022

[1] Zhou, Peilin, Zeqiang Wang, Dading Chong, Zhijiang Guo, Yining Hua, Zichang Su, Zhiyang Teng, Jiageng Wu, and Jie Yang. “METS-CoV: A Dataset of Medical Entity and Targeted Sentiment on COVID-19 Related Tweets.” NIPS 2022.

System Demo

Network Analysis of COVID-19 Symptoms: http://jgwu.top/COVID19-Symptoms-Twitter/network/

The best time is now.
